name: UpdateTicketType
description:
Update a ticket type with a new icon or details.

Use this tool to update a ticket type in the system. You can modify attributes such as icon and other details. Ensure the icon is an emoji from the Twemoji Cheatsheet.

parameters.name: ticket_type_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type as given by Intercom.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type which is given by Intercom.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the API version to use when updating the ticket type. Choose from available versions: 1.0 to 2.9.

parameters.name: ticket_type_name
parameters.description: The name of the ticket type you want to update.

value_schema.description: The name of the ticket type.

parameters.name: ticket_type_description
parameters.description: Describe the ticket type. This should provide an overview or details about the ticket type.

value_schema.description: The description of the ticket type.

parameters.name: ticket_type_icon
parameters.description: Specify an emoji for the ticket type icon using Twemoji Cheatsheet.

value_schema.description: The icon of the ticket type.

parameters.name: is_ticket_type_archived
parameters.description: Set to true to archive the ticket type, or false to keep it active.

value_schema.description: The archived status of the ticket type.

parameters.name: internal_use
parameters.description: Set to true if tickets are intended for internal use only; false for customer sharing.

value_schema.description: Whether the tickets associated with this ticket type are intended for internal use only or will be shared with customers. This is currently a limited attribute.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type which is given by Intercom.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type which is given by Intercom.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the ticket type.

value_schema.description: The name of the ticket type.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the ticket type.

value_schema.description: The description of the ticket type.

parameters.name: icon
parameters.description: The icon of the ticket type.

value_schema.description: The icon of the ticket type.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: The archived status of the ticket type.

value_schema.description: The archived status of the ticket type.

parameters.name: is_internal
parameters.description: Whether the tickets associated with this ticket type are intended for internal use only or will be shared with customers. This is currently a limited attribute.

value_schema.description: Whether the tickets associated with this ticket type are intended for internal use only or will be shared with customers. This is currently a limited attribute.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
